模拟面试问题: Tell me about your strongest backend technology stack.请介绍一下你最擅长的后端技术栈。
What are the main front-end technologies and frameworks you have in-depth experience with?你对哪些主要的前端技术和框架有深入的了解和实践经验呢？
What is your experience with backend development?你在后端开发方面有什么经验？
What database technologies have you worked with?你使用过哪些数据库技术？
Have you used any cloud platforms for deploying applications?你有没有使用过任何云平台来部署应用程序？
Walk me through your experience with deploying and managing applications in production environments. Which tools and methodologies have you used?请详细说明你在生产环境中部署和管理应用程序的经验。你使用过哪些工具和方法论？
What types of serverless platforms have you used in production?你在实际生产中使用过哪些无服务器平台？
How do you decide between relational and NoSQL databases for a project?对于一个项目，你如何在关系型数据库和非关系型数据库之间做出选择？
Could you share a specific example of how you applied Python？你能分享一个你具体是如何应用 Python 的例子吗？
What technologies and frameworks did you utilize when working on mobile app development projects?在参与移动应用开发项目时，你使用了哪些技术和框架呢？
When dealing with version control in software development, what strategies do you follow to organize your work?在软件开发中进行版本控制时，你会遵循哪些策略来组织你的工作？
What tools do you typically use to set up CI/CD pipelines in your projects?在你的项目中，你通常使用哪些工具来设置持续集成 / 持续交付（CI/CD）工作流呢？
Which testing frameworks do you usually use when writing unit tests and integration tests in your projects?在你的项目中编写单元测试和集成测试时，你通常会使用哪些测试框架？
What methods do you use for Agile project, and what are the key activities you take part in during the project process?你使用哪些方法来进行敏捷项目，并且在项目过程中你参与的关键活动有哪些？
Which integrated development environments (IDEs) do you commonly use for your development work?你在开发工作中通常会使用哪些集成开发环境（IDE）呢？
What types of APIs have you worked with in your projects?你曾使用过哪些类型的应用程序编程接口（API）？
What technologies have you used to build APIs?你在构建应用程序编程接口（API）时使用过哪些技术？
What tools did you use when debugging applications?你在调试应用程序时会使用哪些工具？
What practices do you follow to ensure high - quality code in your development work?在你的开发工作中，你遵循哪些实践来确保代码的高质量？
What tools did you use to monitor and track the performance of applications in your work?在你的工作中，你会使用哪些工具来监控和跟踪应用程序的性能？
Could you tell me about a time when you developed an application and what the impact on user engagement was?你能给我讲一讲你开发某个应用程序的经历，以及该应用程序对用户参与度产生了怎样的影响吗？
Could you share an instance where you built a backend infrastructure?你能分享一个你构建后端基础设施的例子吗？
What kinds of third-party APIs have you integrated into applications?你在应用程序中集成过哪些类型的第三方应用程序编程接口（API）呢？
Can you share an experience of optimizing database queries?你能分享一次优化数据库查询的经历吗？
Can you share an instance where you applied caching to an application?你能分享一个在应用程序中应用缓存的实例吗？
Have you ever been involved in migrating a legacy system?你有没有参与过遗留系统的迁移工作？
Have you ever worked on a high - traffic application?你曾经处理过一个高流量的应用程序吗？
Could you tell me about a time when you created a mobile app?你能跟我讲讲你开发一款移动应用的经历吗？
Could you share an instance where you worked on a project with real-time data processing needs?你能分享一个你参与过的有实时数据处理需求的项目实例吗？
Can you talk about a feature you created in an application?你能谈谈你在一个应用程序中创建的一项功能吗？
Have you ever encountered a memory leak issue in your projects?你在项目中是否遇到过内存泄漏问题？
Have you ever faced a critical bug in a production environment?你曾经在生产环境中遇到过严重的漏洞（错误）吗？
Have you taken any measures to enhance application security in your projects?你在项目中采取过哪些措施来增强应用程序的安全性？
Can you share an experience where you managed to lower server expenses? 分享一次你成功降低服务器费用的经历
Have you ever faced a concurrency problem in your development work? 你在开发工作中遇到过并发问题吗？
Have you ever found and resolved a bottleneck in a system? 你曾经在一个系统中发现并解决过瓶颈问题吗？
Can you share an experience where you dealt with the problem of transient API call failures? 你能分享一次你处理过的临时性 API 调用失败问题的经历吗？
Can you share an experience of dealing with cross-browser issues? 你能分享一次处理跨浏览器问题的经历吗?
How did you enhance the user experience in a project? 你在一个项目中是如何提升用户体验的呢？
How did you deal with a sudden increase in traffic for an application? 你是如何应对一个应用程序流量突然增加的情况的呢？
Can you share an experience of delivering a high-quality product? 你能分享一次交付高质量产品的经历吗？
Can you talk about a situation where you had to collaborate with product managers? 能讲一个你与产品经理合作的情况吗？
Can you share an experience of mentoring junior developers？ 能分享一次指导初级开发人员的经历吗？
What was your role in code reviews？ 你在代码审查中担任了什么样的角色呢？
Can you share an experience of communicating tech concepts to non-tech stakeholders? 你能分享一次向非技术利益相关者传达技术概念的经历吗？
How do you think about working on diverse projects? 你对参与不同类型的项目有什么看法？
What do you think about the innovation? 你对创新有什么看法呢？
What specific elements in a role are you seeking to? 你在一个职位中具体在寻求哪些方面的东西呢？
Do you have any questions? 有什么问题你想了解的？
Do you have any questions? 有什么问题你想了解的？
